function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Multi-scalar governance","category":"Transparent governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart city solutions","category":"Smart city technologies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of smart city technologies","category":"Smart city technologies","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seek funding and support from government and private sector, explore cost-saving measures.","category":"Seeking financial support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seek financial assistance or stimulus packages, explore cost-saving measures, diversify revenue streams.","category":"Seeking financial support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strengthening revenue generation from tourism","category":"Tourism revenue generation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversify tourism offerings, develop sustainable financing models, promote domestic tourism","category":"Tourism diversification","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cash payments","category":"Financial support","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Financial support for adaptation projects","category":"Financial support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased funding for clean energy","category":"Clean energy funding","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduce social disparities in access to testing and care, address underlying social determinants.","category":"Socioeconomic disparities","confidence":"Medium"}]}
